verses.text: Unto thee, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, do I lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.
O my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, I \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in thee: let me not be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*, let not mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \w triumph|strong="H5970"\w* over me.

Yea, let none that \w wait|strong="H6960"\w* on thee be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*: let them be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* which \w transgress|strong="H0898"\w* without \w cause|strong="H7387"\w*.
\w Shew|strong="H3045"\w* me thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* me thy \w paths|strong="H0734"\w*.

\w Lead|strong="H1869"\w* me in thy \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*, and \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* me: for thou \add art\add* the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of my \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*; on thee do I \w wait|strong="H6960"\w* all the \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, thy tender \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w* and thy \w lovingkindnesses|strong="H2617"\w*; for they \add have been\add* ever of \w old|strong="H5769"\w*.\f + \fr 25.6 \ft tender…: Heb. bowels\f*

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* not the \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* of my \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, nor my \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w*: according to thy \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* thou me for thy \w goodness’|strong="H2898"\w* sake, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\w Good|strong="H2896"\w* and \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* \add is\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: therefore will he \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.
The \w meek|strong="H6035"\w* will he \w guide|strong="H1869"\w* in \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*: and the \w meek|strong="H6035"\w* will he \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* his \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.

All the \w paths|strong="H0734"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add are\add* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* and \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* unto such as \w keep|strong="H5341"\w* his \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* and his \w testimonies|strong="H5713"\w*.
For thy \w name’s|strong="H8034"\w* sake, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w pardon|strong="H5545"\w* mine \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*; for it \add is\add* \w great|strong="H7227"\w*.

What \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add is\add* he that \w feareth|strong="H3373"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*? him shall he \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \add that\add* he shall \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*.

His \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall \w dwell|strong="H3885"\w* at \w ease|strong="H2896"\w*; and his \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* shall \w inherit|strong="H3423"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 25.13 \ft dwell…: Heb. lodge in goodness\f*

The \w secret|strong="H5475"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* with them that \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* him; and he will \w shew|strong="H3045"\w* them his \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*.\f + \fr 25.14 \ft and…: or, and his covenant to make them know it\f*

Mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \add are\add* \w ever|strong="H8548"\w* toward the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; for he shall \w pluck|strong="H3318"\w* my \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* out of the \w net|strong="H7568"\w*.\f + \fr 25.15 \ft pluck: Heb. bring forth\f*
\w Turn|strong="H6437"\w* thee unto me, and have \w mercy|strong="H2603"\w* upon me; for I \add am\add* \w desolate|strong="H3173"\w* and \w afflicted|strong="H6041"\w*.
The \w troubles|strong="H6869"\w* of my \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* are \w enlarged|strong="H7337"\w*: \add O\add* bring thou me \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of my \w distresses|strong="H4691"\w*.
\w Look|strong="H7200"\w* upon mine \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w* and my \w pain|strong="H5999"\w*; and \w forgive|strong="H5375"\w* all my \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*.

\w Consider|strong="H7200"\w* mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*; for they are \w many|strong="H7231"\w*; and they \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* me with \w cruel|strong="H2555"\w* \w hatred|strong="H8135"\w*.\f + \fr 25.19 \ft cruel…: Heb. hatred of violence\f*
O \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, and \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* me: let me not be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*; for I put my \w trust|strong="H2620"\w* in thee.
Let \w integrity|strong="H8537"\w* and \w uprightness|strong="H3476"\w* \w preserve|strong="H5341"\w* me; for I \w wait|strong="H6960"\w* on thee.
\w Redeem|strong="H6299"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, out of all his \w troubles|strong="H6869"\w*.
